single.title: Farms
single.searchString: | inputlookup SPFarm | stats dc(Id) as count

table.title: Failed Services
table.searchString: | inputlookup SPServiceInstance | stats latest(Status) as SPStatus by Name,Service,Server | where SPStatus!="Disabled" | rex field=Service "Name=(?<SService>.*)" | eval SPService=if(isnull(SPService),SService,SPService) | join type=outer Server,SPService [ search eventtype=mssharepoint-service | stats latest(State) as WinStatus by Name,host | rename host as Server,Name as SPService] | eval WinStatus=if(isnull(WinStatus),"No Service",WinStatus) | stats values(Server) as Servers,values(SPStatus) as "SharePoint Status",values(WinStatus) as "Windows Statusd" by Name,SPService | rename SPService as "Service Name"

table.title: Servers with No Connections (Last 15 Minutes)
table.searchString: | inputlookup SPServer | table Name,Role | join type=outer Name [ search eventtype=mssharepoint-iis | stats count by host | rename host as Name ] | eval count=if(isnull(count),0,count) | search Role!="Invalid" count=0

table.title: Servers with High Load (Last 15 Minutes)
table.searchString: object=Processor counter="% Processor Time" instance="_Total" | stats max(Value) as MaxValue by host | where MaxValue > 80.0 | lookup SPHostInfo host OUTPUTNEW OSBuildNumber | where isnotnull(OSBuildNumber) | eval MaxValue=round(MaxValue,2) | rename host as Name
